docs.lead_paragraph: Too bad Tiger Woods can't go back in time and expand that chart of Jack Nicklaus he taped to his bedroom wall as a teenager.

headline.main: A Bad Day That Woods Says Was Bound to Happen
headline.print_headline: A Bad Day That Woods Says Was Bound to Happen

docs.snippet: Too bad Tiger Woods can't go back in time and expand that chart of Jack Nicklaus he taped to his bedroom wall as a teenager.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Connecticut physical therapist has filed a sex discrimination complaint against the West Hartford senior living center where she works, saying she is being illegally denied health benefits for her wife.

headline.main: Conn. Woman's Complaint Seeks Benefits for Wife
headline.print_headline: Conn. Woman's Complaint Seeks Benefits for Wife

docs.snippet: A Connecticut physical therapist has filed a sex discrimination complaint against the West Hartford senior living center where she works, saying she is being illegally denied health benefits for her wife.

docs.lead_paragraph: Google Inc has unveiled a set of fashionable prescription frames and shades for its Glass Internet-connected eyewear in an image makeover to give it broader appeal before a mass launch in the United States later this year.

headline.main: Google Glass Gets Image Makeover as Launch Nears
headline.print_headline: Google Glass Gets Image Makeover as Launch Nears

docs.snippet: Google Inc has unveiled a set of fashionable prescription frames and shades for its Glass Internet-connected eyewear in an image makeover to give it broader appeal before a mass launch in the United States later this year.

docs.lead_paragraph: Customer service workers at a call center for insurance exchanges established under the federal health care overhaul have sued their employer in federal court, saying they were forced to work unpaid overtime.

headline.main: Health Care Call Center Lawsuit Alleges Unpaid OT
headline.print_headline: Health Care Call Center Lawsuit Alleges Unpaid OT

docs.snippet: Customer service workers at a call center for insurance exchanges established under the federal health care overhaul have sued their employer in federal court, saying they were forced to work unpaid overtime.

docs.lead_paragraph: Congress is revisiting its decision to cut annual cost-of living adjustments to pensions for most working-age military retirees after talk of the cuts drew outrage from veterans groups and others.

headline.main: Lawmakers Revisit COLA Cut for Military Retirees
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Revisit COLA Cut for Military Retirees

docs.snippet: Congress is revisiting its decision to cut annual cost-of living adjustments to pensions for most working-age military retirees after talk of the cuts drew outrage from veterans groups and others.

docs.lead_paragraph: Royal Bank of Scotland's latest 3 billion pound hit for past misdeeds will leave the state-backed bank low on capital, potentially pushing new boss Ross McEwan to speed up a sale of its Citizens banking business in the United States.

headline.main: Latest RBS Hit May Speed Up Sale of U.S. Arm Citizens
headline.print_headline: Latest RBS Hit May Speed Up Sale of U.S. Arm Citizens

docs.snippet: Royal Bank of Scotland's latest 3 billion pound hit for past misdeeds will leave the state-backed bank low on capital, potentially pushing new boss Ross McEwan to speed up a sale of its Citizens banking business in the United States.

docs.lead_paragraph: Down the road from an emergency food pantry where a small crowd waits for the chance to gather free groceries, there is a church sign that reads: "If you need help, ask God. If you don't, thank God."
docs.snippet: Down the road from an emergency food pantry where a small crowd waits for the chance to gather free groceries, there is a church sign that reads: "If you need help, ask God. If you don't, thank God."

docs.lead_paragraph: The first woman to lead a major automaker, an Army Ranger who has met multiple times with President Barack Obama and a man brought to the U.S. illegally as a child are joining Michelle Obama to watch the president deliver his State of the Union address Tuesday.

headline.main: GM Chief,' Dreamer' to Be Guests at Obama Address
headline.print_headline: GM Chief,' Dreamer' to Be Guests at Obama Address

docs.snippet: The first woman to lead a major automaker, an Army Ranger who has met multiple times with President Barack Obama and a man brought to the U.S. illegally as a child are joining Michelle Obama to watch the president deliver his State of the Union...

docs.lead_paragraph: In a sign of how wearable devices are entering the mainstream, a major optical insurance provider will subsidize frames and prescription lenses for customers buying Google Glass.

headline.main: Google Glass to Be Covered by Vision Care Insurer VSP
headline.print_headline: Vision Care Insurer VSP Will Cover Google Glass

docs.abstract: Google and VSP, nation’s biggest optical health insurance provider, strike deal to offer subsidized frames and prescription lenses for Google Glass, Internet-connected eyewear; move underscores how wearable devices are entering mainstream.
docs.snippet: In a sign of how wearable devices are entering the mainstream, a major optical insurance provider will subsidize frames and prescription lenses for customers buying Google Glass.

byline.contributor: Katie Thomas contributed reporting from New York.
